metadata.name: Linux Webshell Indicators
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious sub processes of web server processes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/httpd')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/lighttpd')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/nginx')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/apache2')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/node')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('/caddy')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/java')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('tomcat')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('/bin/java')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('websphere'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/whoami')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ifconfig')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ip')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bin/uname')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bin/cat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/bin/crontab')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/hostname')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/iptables')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netstat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/pwd')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/route'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious sub processes of web server processes

metadata.objective: False positive: Web applications that invoke Linux command line tools References: https://www.acunetix.com/blog/articles/web-shells-101-using-php-introduction-web-shells-part-2/, https://media.defense.gov/2020/Jun/09/2002313081/-1/-1/0/CSI-DETECT-AND-PREVENT-WEB-SHELL-MALWARE-20200422.PDF
